data.title: You're developing a website. What are the top database management tools you should be using?
data.meta_description: Learn how to choose the best database management tools for your web development projects. Explore the differences between SQL and NoSQL databases, and how to design, develop, and administer them.
data.text:
If you're developing a website, you need to choose the right database management tools for your data needs. A database is a structured collection of information that can be accessed, modified, and manipulated by your website's code. Database management tools are software applications that help you create, manage, and query your databases. There are different types of databases and tools, each with their own advantages and disadvantages. In this article, we'll explore some of the top database management tools you should be using for your web development projects.
